# Environment Setup

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(pmr)
```

# Process Data

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# read data
resource_allocations <- read_csv(paste0(here(), "/data/Resource Allocations project - Term 1.csv")) %>% 
  type.convert() %>% clean_names()

# cleaning procedure
resource_allocations <- resource_allocations %>%
  rename("pgy" = pgy1_vs_pgy2_3_both)
```

```{r}
ra_pgy1 <- resource_allocations %>%
  filter(pgy == 1)
```
